item.title: STEEL PARTNERS HOLDINGS LP 10-K
item.description: STEEL PARTNERS HOLDINGS LP, which is in the Miscellaneous Primary Metal Products [3390] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 13, 2021 had 44035 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2020 - 417 instances company - 414 instances december - 413 instances 31 - 408 instances financial - 384 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
